Hi Daniel,

It seems like the use case that we were trying to implement is not possible
with EPP, as you mentioned it only blocks the files leaving the system. You
can go ahead and close this request, we will check if there is a workaround
for this.

If you’re all set, just let me know, and I can close the ticket. If you still need help or have any questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out—I’m here to support you.

Looking forward to your response!

Thank you!
